Talk_21: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Had a chance to try out what I gave you?
Talk_123:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>I've got another one, so it's yours if you
want it.<sp:5:1:0> Just give me a moment.
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_01>All the swords I gave you have different
strengths, so it's worth training with all
of them.
It's taken me countless hours of training
to be able to wield them properly.
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>If you learn the <clr:0000>traits of different swords<clr:ffff>
and use those traits to your advantage,
then the decay won't be a big deal.
Best way to learn is to spend
time training.

<snd:TalkPositive_01>Anyway, as you can see, I'm using this
area. So if you do intend to train, you'll
need to do it elsewhere.
Talk_First01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Hi, sorry, but I'm busy at the moment,
so I'll have to talk to you between swings.

You never know when monsters will pop
up, so I take my training very seriously.

<snd:TalkPositive_00>You might've noticed, but each sword
<clr:0000>handles differently<clr:ffff>, so it's wise to try
different types to get used to the feel.
Talk_First02:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you know their handling and practice
plenty, the fact that they're <clr:0000>decayed<clr:ffff>
won't matter so much.
Talk_29:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>The soldier's broadsword is light and slim.
It was pretty easy to use, wasn't it?

With that sword, I can release <clr:0000>charged
attacks really quickly<clr:ffff>. I kinda like it.
Talk_112:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>There we have a soldier's broadsword
and a royal broadsword.
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_01>Word on the street is that Princess
Zelda's been sighted at Hyrule Castle.

It's crucial that I get training in wherever
I can so I'm ready to go if I get sent out
in a search party.
Talk_113:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>There we have a soldier's broadsword
and a knight's broadsword.
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Now that the Zora soldiers have come,
it feels like training with them would be
a valuable use of my time.
Just think about how adept they are
with spears!

I have heard that you're capable of using
not just swords but many other types
of weapons...
Which means I can learn a ton from
you too!
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Just think about how adept they are
with spears!

I have heard that you're capable of using
not just swords but many other types
of weapons...
Which means I can learn a ton from
you too!
Talk_116:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>It's a little worse for wear, but it's a fine
sword, just the same. Take good care
of it.
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'm still in training, but even so, I'd love to
spar with you sometime.
Talk_117:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_01>I was going to give it to you, but it
looks like you don't have room for
any more weapons.
Well, if you want it, you know where to
find it. After you've created some space,
that is.
Talk_118:
<snd:TalkPositive_01>They're a bit worn, but they've got some
life left in them. Feel free to take them.

Each sword <clr:0000>handles differently<clr:ffff>, so it's
wise to try out different types.
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think_01>Is the princess really at <clr:0000>Hyrule Castle<clr:ffff>
when it's like...THAT?

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Whatever the case may be, this is what
I've been training for. When the time
comes, I'll head out on the search too.
Talk_119:
<snd:TalkPositive_01>It's a bit worn, but it's still usable. It's all
yours if you want it.

Each sword <clr:0000>handles differently<clr:ffff>, so it's
wise to try out different types.
Talk_17: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>I'll go anywhere if it's for Zelda!
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>There's no telling what will happen, so I'm
keeping it up with my training.

If reinforcements are needed, then we can
link up with the Zora to attack or defend.

Anyway, best of luck to you, Link!
Talk_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>Ah, the knight's broadsword! It has some
heft and increases in power if you're
<clr:0000>severely weakened<clr:ffff>.
Despite the advantage it offers, I wouldn't
suggest actively seeking out such
situations, you know?
Talk_31:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>The royal broadsword!


Its <clr:0000>counterattack power when dodging an
enemy attack is potent<clr:ffff>.

But my own swordplay isn't there yet, so
I can't make the most of that sword at
this point.
Talk_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>Right, the soldier's broadsword. It's light
and slim. I'm curious how you're liking it.

I bet it can <clr:0000>unleash charged attacks
quickly<clr:ffff>. I really enjoy the mobility of
that sword.
Talk_33:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>Ah, the knight's broadsword. It has some
heft and <clr:0000>increases in power if you're in a
weakened state<clr:ffff>.
Despite the advantage it offers, I wouldn't
suggest actively seeking out such
situations, you know?
Talk_34:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>Right, the royal broadsword.


Its <clr:0000>counterattack power when dodging an
enemy is potent<clr:ffff>.

But my own swordplay isn't there yet, so
I can't make the most of that sword at
this point.
Talk_101:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>There we have a soldier's broadsword,
a knight's broadsword, and a
royal broadsword.
Talk_102:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>A soldier's broadsword is what the castle
soldiers used to fight with.

It's light and nimble, which leads me to
believe you could <clr:0000>unleash charged attacks
really quickly <clr:ffff>with it. It's a great weapon.
Talk_103:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>The knight's broadsword was used by
knights in defense of the castle way
back when.
Once, a monster attacked me while I was
wielding the broadsword, and I thought it
was<clr:0000> the end for me<clr:ffff>...
But I timed my swings carefully, and it
unleashed an <clr:0000>incredible blow<clr:ffff>!

Maybe it was my adrenaline, but...no.
It had to be the sword. It really
surprised me.
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>If you learn the <clr:0000>traits of different swords<clr:ffff>
and use them to your advantage, then a
bit of disrepair won't be a big deal.
Did you notice the unique qualities of
what I gave you?
Talk_104:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>The royal broadsword was used by
knights to guard members of the
royal family.
Its <clr:0000>counterattack power when dodging an
enemy attack is potent<clr:ffff>.

But my own swordplay isn't there yet, so
I can't make the most of that sword at
this point.
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Speaking of, are you feeling more
comfortable with swords now?
Talk_105:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>I need to keep practicing so I can
someday become as fine a swordsman
as the legendary Link!
Talk_106:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS_01>I'm happy there's someone other than me
who's interested in weapons. Inspires me
to put my all into my training.
Talk_108:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>You can have it if you want. I'll give it to
you, so just give me a moment.
Greeting02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:CallFar_01>It's Link! We all really appreciate the
effort you put in.
Talk_109:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>There we have a knight's broadsword
and a royal broadsword.
Talk_120:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS_01>I'm happy there's someone other than me
who's so interested in weapons.

Sorry I've been consumed with my
training this whole time. Aja's the...<sp:5:1:0>name.<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL_01>Wait.


<sp:0:2:2:7d00>Link?!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


My apologies! I was being selfish, not
even looking up from practice to see
that it's you!
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>It's such an honor to meet you, sir.


Well, now that I've met you, I'm even
more motivated to become a master
swordsman just like you, Link! <sp:5:0:0>Back to it!
Greeting03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:CallFar_01>It's Link! Do you ever rest? Well, we all
really appreciate the effort you put in.
Greeting04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_01>I could use some more time alone to really
focus on my training, so can you...leave
me alone for a bit?
My training is especially challenging on
rainy days, after all. If I'm not careful,
lightning might strike my metal weapon.
I'm definitely on my toes here.
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Are you making good use of the
other swords?
Talk_122:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Make sure you give yourself plenty of time
to practice with it.
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>If reinforcements are needed, then we can
link up with the Zora to attack or defend.

Anyway, best of luck to you, Link!
